hymns.title: All creatures of our God and King
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 1. All creatures of our God and King

hymns.title: Praise to the Lord
verses: Kine mumona bibusa byanji moba onse;
Langulukai byakonsha kuba Aye wimubila lusa lonse.
Banji bonse, bamwimbile bulongo Na nyimbo ya kumutota

hymns.title: All people that on earth do dwel
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 3. All people that on earth do dwel

hymns.title: My heart and voice I raise
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 6. My heart and voice I raise

hymns.title: Let the song go round the earth
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 7. Let the song go round the earth
verses: Bomvwe ne bena Chaina, ne Bansamya bonsetu.
Ne monse mu Africa batumbijike Yesu.
Ne ku makuji onse a ku kalunga,
Bembe bena mavunda ne baji ku mashika.

hymns.title: Let us with a gladsome mind
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 8. Let us with a gladsome mind

hymns.title: LESA
verses: Ne kalunga ka mema pamo ---- tutote;
Tutote Lesa mwine wa myaka yonse.
Mu kipasha kyanji kya myaka yonse.
Ne Evwa bo bantu batanshi ---- tutote,

hymns.title: O Lord my God
verses: LESA wami, byo mmona byo mwalenga,
Byo nenda mungye ne kumona bichi,

hymns.title: We plough the fields
verses: Ne nkunwa ke imene mu lusa lwa Lesa.
Byonse byo tumona bifuna kwi Lesa,
Nanchi, tutote mambo a lolwa lusa lwanji.
Ne bipangwa ne bishutu ne byonse byo tuja.
Ye yenka wibajisha ba pano pa ntanda
Ne mana, ne bulume, ne mema, ne byo tuja.

hymns.title: Praise Him, praise Him
verses: Kilishitu wiya, Aye ye wa bulobo,

hymns.title: Crown Him with many crowns
verses: Umvwai lwimbo wa mwiulu wakila yonsetu.
Mupopwelai ke Mfumu wa myaka yonsetu.
Mfumu wa mweo pe washinda kilende
Wasanguka ne mu lufu mu kupulusha bantu.
Lufu lwanji lo lwitupa mweo wa pe na pe.
Mfumu wa mutende ye Mfumu wa konse,
Upwisha nkondo pano panshi amba bamutote.
Ne bufumu bwanji kechi bukapwa ne,
Ba mwiulu bamutota ku maulu anji.
Bito bya mu makasa anji byavwikwa lukumo
Pa kukumya lunmanamo lwa Mwana wa Lesa.
Mfumu wa mwiulu Lesa yenka umo,
Ne Mupashi watumwa panshi kufuma mwiulu,
Lutotelo ne lukumo lo lwenu kikupu.

hymns.title: O Lord of heaven and earth
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 14. O Lord of heaven and earth

hymns.title: Praise my soul the King of Heaven
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 16. Praise my soul the King of Heaven
verses: Utoteshe, utoteshe, Mfumu wa myaka yonse.
Ne lelo uji pamotu, kasa atemwa lusa,
Tumutote, tumutote, wa kishinka pa bonsse.
Mu maboko anji mwine mo twikela mutende,
Twanekena no buluba, bulakata na mwela,
Bantu bo baalauka, Lesa ke waluka ne.
Tumutote, tumutote, Mwine wa mwiulu pe.
Anwe bilengwa byonsetu, bya mwiulu ne panshi,
Tumutote, bonse nenu, Lesa wetu wa lusa.

hymns.title: Praise, praise ye the name
verses: TOTAI jizhina ja Yehoba Lesa wetu
Poso bonse bomvwishe bya lusa lwaanji.
Ye wasangukile kine, wabwelele kwiulu kwanji,
Ye ukeya jibiji pa kulonda banji,
Mu jonkaja juba ja bulume ne lukumo
Ntanda ikalumbuluka ke yawamisha ne ya buya;
Mambo Mfumu ukeya na bazhila banji.
Mu kubwezha byonse monka mo byajinga.
Bya mwiulu ne bya panshi bikasangalala,
Ne majimi ne bichitu bikoba nobe lusekelo;

hymns.title: Ring the bells of heaven
verses: Sapwila na nseko konse ko muya

hymns.title: Glory be to God the Father
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 19. Glory be to God the Father

hymns.title: Praise God from Whom all blessings flow (Doxology)
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 20. Praise God from Whom all blessings flow (Doxology)

hymns.title: Crown Him, crown Him
verses: Ne bonse ba pano pa ntanda

hymns.title: Rejoice the Lord is King
verses: Mukuzhi ye Mfumu, Mfumu wa butemwe,
Waikele ku kilujo kya kwa Lesa,
Bufumu bo bwanji, ne lūsa lonsetu
Lwa pa byonse bya mwiulu ne bya panshi.
Wapewa kii wa lufu ne wa kalunga,
Yesu ye ukeya na kuchiba mambo,

hymns.title: We praise Thee O God
verses: Mambo etu wazhima mu michima yetu.
Na mujilo wa Lesa wafuma mwiulu.

hymns.title: Holy, holy, holy
verses: Wazhila, wazhila, wa lusa ne lusa,
Lesa wa myaka ne wa bibusa.
Nabyo bya mwiulu ne bya pano panshi,
Lesa wa myaka ne wa bibusa.

hymns.title: O worship the King
verses: Wa myaka ne myaka ne wa lukumo
Wa mana onsetu ne wa bulobo.
Mu moba onsetu a myeo yetu
Byanji bya lusa bya myaka yonse;
Bimweka ku juba ne mu mikola,
Mu majimi monse ne mu matala.
Pene pene pamo; po paji lusa,
Pa lusa, pa lusa, po pa Kalvalı,

hymns.title: Immortal, invisible
verses: YEHOBA wa myaka, wa mana onse,
Anweba mwi bumi bwa bantu bonse.
Yehoba wa myaka, wa mana onse,

hymns.title: Jesus shall reign
verses: Ba mu mikoka yonse ya pano

hymns.title: Rejoice and be merry
verses: ANWE bantu bonse ba pano panshi
Ne ngolode ya Mfumu wetu Yesu

hymns.title: While shepherds watched
verses: Nemuletela byawama bya ku bantu bonse.
Mu Betelema ja lelo Mukuzhi wasemwa,
Yenka wa kwibapulusha bantu banji bonse.
Bamwekele ne kutota Lesa wa mwiulu.
Mutende ku bantu bonse ba pano pa ntanda.

hymns.title: The First Nowell
verses: Sa balama jitanga ja mikoko yabo
Sa kasama pa ntanda, ponsetu patoka
Ne ba mana basatu bafumine kwaba
Sa bendela mu kyokya kyeya kyatoka,
Sa bata ne muchima mu kumona Mfumu
Ne kabangabanga' ka kaya ku muzhika
Ne kufika ku muzhi wa Betelema,
Ko kalekele kwenda ne kwimana ponka
Ne ba mana basatu batwelele monka
Ne kulambula konka byonse bya bufumu,
Ne atweba bonsetu na muchima umo
Ye yenka walengele ntanda ne jiulu,
Ne kukula atweba na mashi anji.

hymns.title: In dulci jubilo
verses: Mwana ye twatemwa walala mu banyama' mo,
Mwana wanengelatu ye balela kwi inanji;
Obewa Yesu mwanyike, nakusaka kimye kyonse.
Na lusa lobe lelo, yobe Mfumu wa bamfumu.
Butemwe bwa Tata buno, ne lusa Iwa Mwana luno.
Twaji twafwa nao pa mambo a bubi bwetu,
Lusekelo lwepi nanchi, kana monkamwa mwiulu?
Mwa bamalaika mo bembila lwimbo mupya,
Muvumina ngengele mu kipango kya bamfumu,

hymns.title: Thou didst leave Thy throne Room Jor Thee
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 35. Thou didst leave Thy throne Room Jor Thee
verses: Mwaishile Nkambo na mambo a bubi
Nkomvwe jiwi jenu ja kungita amiwa,
IYAI bantu bonse ba pano pa ntanda,
Mutende bantu bonse ba pano pa ntanda,
Mu muzhi wa Davida Mupulushi wenu,
Talai bantu bonse kuji Mwana Lesa,
Wafumine mwiulu, ne bumi bwa myaka
Imbai bantu bonse, imbai kwi Lesa,
Kwi Yesu Kilishitu mwine, Mupulushi wetu.

hymns.title: Once in Royal David's City
verses: Ye Lesa, ye Nkambo ya bonse;
Ye Mfuma wa myaka ne wa myaka

hymns.title: A child this day is born
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 38. A child this day is born
verses: Sekelai bakafunga, ki ka kyo muchina?
Lwaiya ku bantu bonse pa kusemwa mwana.
Ba lūsa bo atuma Mwine wa mwiulu.
Batota Lesa wetu ye Mfumu wa mwiulu,
Bataine Mwana Yesu, ne inanji Maliya.

hymns.title: Unto us a boy is born
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 39. Unto us a boy is born

hymns.title: O come, O come, Emmanuel
verses: Ku mfungwa ya buzha bwa panshi

hymns.title: O Little Town of Bethlehem
verses: Ke pakuba mu mashinda obe onsetu
Kechi bamumvwa sa apana bibusa ne,

hymns.title: See amid the winter's snow
verses: Aye ye Mwana Lesa ye batengela
Juba ja lusekelo, jo ja lupulukilo,
Yenka waji na Lesa ne na bamalaika.
Ki ka kyo mwalekela mikoko pa
Ba mwiulu sa bemba, Mupulushi wasemwa.

hymns.title: Of the Father's love begotten
verses: Ne bijipo ne byajingapo ku nyuma

hymns.title: Tell me the story of Jesus
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 52. Tell me the story of Jesus

hymns.title: Ride on, ride on in majesty
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 54. Ride on, ride on in majesty

hymns.title: One day when heaven
verses: Ba pano panshi sa boba bibi,

hymns.title: Have you ever heard the story
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 56. Have you ever heard the story
verses: Ba malaika ne ba mana bapwila
Nasekela kwimubula ne lelo ye ujiko
Mwaumvwa ne byo anyanta pa mema ne kipupu
Kuya kuji bana banji pa mema a Ngalilea,
Ne kipupu byo kyaumva jiwi ne kuzhindama?
Nasekela kwimubula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Mwaumvwa byo alombele Lesa mu Ngesemani,
Ne byo afwile lufu lubi konka ku Kalvali,
Wabikwa miba ku mutwe ne bivwalo byavwala ?
Amu monse witukula ne lelo ye ujiko.
Wafwainwa kupopwelwa Aye Nkambo wa bantu,
Aye yenka ye tupopa ye Nkambo Mwina bantu.
Atotwe ne kutotwa! Ilunga wa bisela
Ne mumyaka yonsetu, Yesu Kilishitu ukatotwa.

hymns.title: Who is He in yonder stall?
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 57. Who is He in yonder stall?

hymns.title: When I survey
verses: Poso mu lufu lwa Yesu Kilishitu.
Ne ku makasa ne ku maulu!

hymns.title: On Calvary's brow
verses: Ye Kalama wa pe na pe.

hymns.title: Jesus keep me
verses: NTANGI wa lufu lwa kwa Yesu

hymns.title: When I survey
verses: Kana ku lufu Iwa kwa Yes
Biji pamo na bya kwa Yesu.

hymns.title: Christ the Lord is risen today
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 70. Christ the Lord is risen today

hymns.title: Christ the Lord is risen today ,Alleluia!
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 72. Christ the Lord is risen today ,Alleluia!
verses: Ku kilujo kya kwa Lesa, Aleluya!

hymns.title: Low in the grave He lay
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 74. Low in the grave He lay
verses: Pano ke wa bumi bwa myaka yonse;

hymns.title: Golden harps are sounding
verses: Mfumu wa lukumo, Mfumu wa lusa,

hymns.title: The head that once
verses: Ke wa bumi ne wa mweo

hymns.title: Lo He comes with clouds descending
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 80. Lo He comes with clouds descending

hymns.title: When the trumpet of the Lord
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 82. When the trumpet of the Lord
verses: Ba kwa Kilishitu bakapwila mu muzhi
Aja juba japelako pa kusanguka bafu
Ne kuvwala lukumo lwa kwa Yesu,
Twisambe pa mambo a lusa lwanji,

hymns.title: It may be at morn
verses: Mambo bonse mwaluba juba jo nkeya
Mambo a Yesu yenka Aye ukey

hymns.title: Breathe on me, breath of God
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 86. Breathe on me, breath of God

hymns.title: Holy Spirit faithful Guide
verses: MUPASHI Ntangi wetu mwikale ne atweba,
Tukomvwa jiwi janji amba, Iyai bonse.

hymns.title: Our Blest Redeemer
verses: Jiwi janji jitwambila no mwela wapela
Mwi Yesu, mwi Yesu, mwi Yesu,
Anwe bantu bonse, mukiji mu mfishi,

hymns.title: Why do you wait ?
verses: Fwenya, ku bwipi na Lesa wetu,

hymns.title: It is written in the book
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 94. It is written in the book

hymns.title: Come to Jesus
verses: Pano iyai kwawama, iyai kwi Yesu.
Aye waswa, Aye waswa, Aye waswa
Pano Aye Yesu waswa, Aye waswa
Yesu ukemutokesha na mashi a kwa

hymns.title: Have you been to Jesus?
verses: Na bubi bwa pano pa ntanda,
Owa monka mu mashi a Mupulus

hymns.title: There is a gate that stands ajar
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 101. There is a gate that stands ajar
verses: Watayile mweo wanji yense mu bya
Kechi utaye mweo wobe yense mu
Ye uji na bumi bwa pe.

hymns.title: Cross of Jesus
verses: Pa kwiya Yesu kana nkoba byepi?
